title: Basic gingerbread for biscuits and houses
ingredients: ['725g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '2 dessertspoons ground ginger', '2 dessertspoons ground cinnamon', '1 dessertspoon ground nutmeg', '1 dessertspoon ground cloves', '225g butter, softened', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '525g treacle', '2 eggs']
